U

UIupdate - Class in util
class for creating GUI updates
UIupdate() - Constructor for class util.UIupdate
 
update(Runnable) - Static method in class util.UIupdate
execute code in the JavaFx thread use example: UIupdate.update(()->{ //code to run });

creates an ParkEntry according to Order and Card

update the time of the person exits

UpdateOrder(Order) - Method in class serverLogic.OrderController
Update an Order
updateWorkerLogginDB(String, boolean) - Method in class serverLogic.WorkerController
